title: US, UK and Israel blame Iran for attack on Israeli-managed tanker
content:
1. US, UK and Israel blame Iran for attack on Israeli-managed tanker  Fox News
  2. US, UK and Israel blame Iran for ship attack; Tehran denies  Associated Press

  4. Latest attack exposes Iran's empty toolbox  Israel Hayom
  5. Top Israeli, UK generals speak after attack on ship off Oman  Reuters

localize.title: 米国、英国、イスラエルは、イスラエルが管理するタンカーへの攻撃についてイランを非難
